Interaction Model¶

InteractionModel¶

class ml4ir.base.model.scoring.interaction_model.InteractionModel¶

Bases: object

Define an Interaction Model that acts on input features to convert them into numeric features to be fed into further neural network layers

feature_layer_op(inputs: Dict[str, tensorflow.python.keras.engine.input_layer.Input])¶
transform_features_op(train_features, metadata_features)¶

UnivariateInteractionModel¶

class ml4ir.base.model.scoring.interaction_model.UnivariateInteractionModel(feature_config: ml4ir.base.features.feature_config.FeatureConfig, tfrecord_type: str, feature_layer_keys_to_fns: dict = {}, max_sequence_size: int = 0, file_io: ml4ir.base.io.file_io.FileIO = None)¶

Bases: ml4ir.base.model.scoring.interaction_model.InteractionModel

Defines an interaction model that configures feature layer operations on individual features

feature_layer_op(inputs: Dict[str, tensorflow.python.keras.engine.input_layer.Input])¶

Apply feature layer functions on each of the tf.keras.Input

Parameters

inputs – dictionary of keras input symbolic tensors

Returns

dictionary of feature tensors that can be used for training metadata_features: dictionary of feature tensors that can be used as additional metadata

Return type

train_features

transform_features_op(train_features: Dict[str, tensorflow.python.framework.ops.Tensor], metadata_features: Dict[str, tensorflow.python.framework.ops.Tensor])¶

Transform train_features and metadata_features after the univariate feature_layer fns have been applied.

Parameters

  • train_features – dictionary of feature tensors that can be used for training

  • metadata_features – dictionary of feature tensors that can be used as additional metadata

Returns

single dense trainable feature tensor metadata_features: dictionary of metadata feature tensors

Return type

train_features
